name: dicom_hdr
author: Mallinckrodt Institute of Radiology
description: A tool to print DICOM file information to stdout.

inputs.description: Include hexadecimal printout for integer values.
inputs.name: Hexadecimal printout flag

inputs.description: Don't include element names in the printout.
inputs.name: No element names flag

inputs.description: Dump Siemens EXtra INFO text (0029 1020), if present (can be VERY lengthy).
inputs.name: Siemens EXtra INFO flag

inputs.description: Dump multi-frame information, if present (1 line per frame, plus an XML-style header/footer). This option also implies -noname.
inputs.name: Multi-frame information flag

inputs.description: Dump n words of binary data also.
inputs.name: Binary data dump count

inputs.description: Show slice times from Siemens mosaic images.
inputs.name: Slice times flag

inputs.description: Show slice times from Siemens mosaic images verbosely. (multiple uses increase verbosity, can dump CSA data)
inputs.name: Verbose slice times flag
